00020 std::vector<ngl::Real> SimulationParameters::getFloatVectorFromString
00021                                             (
00022                                                 const std::string _str,
00023                                                 const int _d
00024                                             )
00025 {
00026     //split string into array of strings by ","
00027     std::vector<std::string> strArray;
00028     boost::split(strArray, _str, boost::is_any_of(","));
00029 
00030     //loop through strings and convert to float array
00031     std::vector<ngl::Real> floatArray;
00032     for (int i = 0; i < _d; i++) floatArray.push_back(boost::lexical_cast<ngl::Real>(strArray[i]));
00033 
00034     //return array of float
00035     return floatArray;
00036 }

00038 void SimulationParameters::initialiseEnvironment(
00039                                                         bool &o_rbdCollsionEnabled,
00040                                                         ngl::Vector &o_boundaryPosition,
00041                                                         ngl::Vector &o_boundaryDimension,
00042                                                         ngl::Real &o_boundaryRestitutionCoefficientForFluid,
00043                                                         std::vector<Particle> &o_rbdSphereList,
00044                                                         ngl::Real &o_rbdSphereRestitutionCoefficient,
00045                                                         ngl::Colour &o_boundaryColour
00046                                                         )
00047 {
00048 
00049     /*----Load Settings from XML File----------------------------------------------*/
00050 
00051     pugi::xml_document doc;
00052     doc.load_file(s_settingsDocumentPath.c_str());
00053 
00054     //temporary variable
00055     std::vector<ngl::Real> tmp;
00056 
00057     pugi::xpath_node_set node = doc.select_nodes("/Settings/Environment");
00058 
00059     /*--- Reading Boundry Parameters-------------------------------------------*/
00060 
00061     tmp = getFloatVectorFromString(node.first().node().select_single_node("Boundary").node().attribute("position").value(), 3);
00062     o_boundaryPosition.set(tmp[0], tmp[1], tmp[2]);
00063 
00064     tmp = getFloatVectorFromString(node.first().node().select_single_node("Boundary").node().attribute("dimension").value(), 3);
00065     o_boundaryDimension.set(tmp[0], tmp[1], tmp[2]);
00066 
00067     o_boundaryRestitutionCoefficientForFluid = node.first().node().select_single_node("Boundary").node().attribute("restitutionForFluid").as_float();
00068 
00069     tmp = getFloatVectorFromString(node.first().node().select_single_node("Boundary").node().attribute("colour").value(), 3);
00070     o_boundaryColour.set(tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2],1.0);
00071 
00072     /*--- Read CollisionParameters-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00073 
00074     node = doc.select_nodes("/Settings/Environment/Obstacles");
00075     o_rbdCollsionEnabled =  node.first().node().attribute("enabled").as_bool();
00076 
00077     o_rbdSphereRestitutionCoefficient = node.first().node().attribute("restitution").as_float();
00078 
00079     /*---- Creating and Storing Rigid Body Sphere -----------------------------------------*/
00080 
00081     node = node.first().node().select_nodes("Sphere");
00082     for (pugi::xpath_node_set::const_iterator it = node.begin(); it != node.end(); ++it)
00083     {
00084         //get details for an obstacle
00085         pugi::xpath_node node1 = *it;
00086 
00087         //get parameters active parameter
00088         tmp = getFloatVectorFromString(node1.node().attribute("position").value(), 3);
00089         ngl::Vector position(tmp[0], tmp[1], tmp[2]);
00090 
00091         ngl::Vector velocity(0,0,0);
00092 
00093         ngl::Real collisionRadius = node1.node().attribute("collisionRadius").as_float();
00094 
00095         ngl::Real drawRadius = node1.node().attribute("drawRadius").as_float();
00096 
00097         tmp = getFloatVectorFromString(node1.node().attribute("colour").value(), 3);
00098         ngl::Colour colour(tmp[0], tmp[1], tmp[2]);
00099 
00100         /*---Create and Add Spheres to RBDSphere List----------------------------------------------------*/
00101 
00102         Particle p = Particle (SimulationParameters::s_nextRBDSphereId--,0,position,colour,collisionRadius,drawRadius,velocity);
00103 
00104         o_rbdSphereList.push_back(p);
00105     }
00106 }

00108 void SimulationParameters::initialiseSPHFluidSolver(
00109                                                         ngl::Real &o_smoothingLength,
00110                                                         std::vector<FluidParticle> &o_fluidParticleList,
00111                                                         std::string &o_visualizationType,
00112                                                         bool& o_drawFluidParticles,
00113                                                         std::vector<std::string> &o_fluidNameList
00114                                                     )
00115 {
00116     //load settings xml file
00117     pugi::xml_document doc;
00118     doc.load_file(s_settingsDocumentPath.c_str());
00119 
00120     //load global settings here
00121     pugi::xpath_node_set node = doc.select_nodes("/Settings/FluidSolver");
00122 
00123     //read smoothing length
00124     o_smoothingLength = node.first().node().attribute("smoothingLength").as_float();
00125 
00126     //initially reserve space for maximum growth of particle list
00127     int initialReservedParticleCount =node.first().node().attribute("initialReservedParticleCount").as_int();
00128     o_fluidParticleList.reserve(initialReservedParticleCount);
00129 
00130     o_visualizationType = node.first().node().attribute("visualization").value();
00131     o_drawFluidParticles = node.first().node().attribute("enableVisulization").as_bool();
00132 
00133     std::cout << "\n\t\tSmooth Particle Hydrodynamics Solver" << std::endl;
00134     std::cout << "\n\t Smoothing Length :: " << o_smoothingLength << "\t Visualization Shading Type :: " << o_visualizationType << "\n\n" << std::endl;
00135 
00136     //tmp variable
00137     std::vector<ngl::Real> tmp;
00138 
00139 
00140 
00141     /*------Getting List of Fluids-------------------------------*/
00142     node = doc.select_nodes("/Settings/FluidSolver/Fluid");
00143     for (pugi::xpath_node_set::const_iterator it = node.begin(); it != node.end(); ++it)
00144     {
00145         //get details for a fluid
00146         pugi::xpath_node node = *it;
00147 
00148         //get its active parameter
00149         bool isActive = node.node().attribute("active").as_bool();
00150 
00151         //skip this fluid if not active
00152         if (isActive)
00153         {
00154             //read parameters
00155             ngl::Real volume = boost::lexical_cast<ngl::Real>(node.node().select_single_node("Volume").node().child_value());
00156 
00157             ngl::Real restDensity = boost::lexical_cast<ngl::Real>(node.node().select_single_node("RestDensity").node().child_value());
00158 
00159             tmp = getFloatVectorFromString(node.node().select_single_node("Colour").node().attribute("value").value(), 3);
00160             ngl::Colour color(tmp[0], tmp[1], tmp[2]);
00161 
00162             std::string meshName = node.node().select_single_node("Obj").node().child_value();
00163             ngl::Obj mesh(meshName);
00164 
00165             tmp = getFloatVectorFromString(node.node().select_single_node("Obj").node().attribute("center").value(), 3);
00166             ngl::Vector centerOfMesh(tmp[0], tmp[1], tmp[2]);
00167 
00168             tmp = getFloatVectorFromString(node.node().select_single_node("Velocity").node().attribute("value").value(), 3);
00169             ngl::Vector velocity(tmp[0], tmp[1], tmp[2]);
00170 
00171             ngl::Real viscosityConstant = boost::lexical_cast<ngl::Real>(node.node().select_single_node("ViscosityConstant").node().child_value());
00172 
00173             ngl::Real gasConstant = boost::lexical_cast<ngl::Real>(node.node().select_single_node("GasConstant").node().child_value());
00174 
00175             ngl::Real surfaceTensionCoefficient = node.node().select_single_node("SurfaceTension").node().attribute("coefficient").as_float();
00176             ngl::Real surfaceTensionThreshold = node.node().select_single_node("SurfaceTension").node().attribute("threshold").as_float();
00177             ngl::Real surfaceColorCoefficient = node.node().select_single_node("SurfaceTension").node().attribute("color").as_float();
00178 
00179             ngl::Real interfaceTensionCoefficient = node.node().select_single_node("SurfaceInterface").node().attribute("coefficient").as_float();
00180             ngl::Real interfaceTensionThreshold = node.node().select_single_node("SurfaceInterface").node().attribute("threshold").as_float();
00181             ngl::Real interfaceColorCoefficient = node.node().select_single_node("SurfaceInterface").node().attribute("color").as_float();
00182 
00183             ngl::Real collisionRadius = boost::lexical_cast<ngl::Real>(node.node().select_single_node("CollisionRadius").node().child_value());
00184 
00185             ngl::Real drawRadius = boost::lexical_cast<ngl::Real>(node.node().select_single_node("DrawRadius").node().child_value());
00186 
00187             std::string name = node.node().attribute("name").value();
00188 
00189             //calculate mass per particle
00190             int particleCount = mesh.getNumVerts();
00191             ngl::Real mass = restDensity * (volume / ((ngl::Real)particleCount));
00192 
00193                 for (int i = 0; i < particleCount; i++)
00194                 {
00195                     FluidParticle f = FluidParticle(
00196                                                         SimulationParameters::s_nextFluidParticleId++,
00197                                                         mass,
00198                                                         restDensity,
00199                                                         centerOfMesh + mesh.getVertexAtIndex(i),
00200                                                         velocity,
00201                                                         viscosityConstant,
00202                                                         gasConstant,
00203                                                         surfaceTensionCoefficient,
00204                                                         surfaceTensionThreshold,
00205                                                         surfaceColorCoefficient,
00206                                                         interfaceTensionCoefficient,
00207                                                         interfaceTensionThreshold,
00208                                                         interfaceColorCoefficient,
00209                                                         color,
00210                                                         collisionRadius,
00211                                                         drawRadius,
00212                                                         name
00213                                                     );
00214                     //create particle @ mesh vertices and add to particle list
00215                     o_fluidParticleList.push_back (f);
00216                 }
00217                 std::cout << "Fluid Name :: " << name << "\t \t Fluid Particles Count  :: " << particleCount << std::endl;
00218                 o_fluidNameList.push_back(name);
00219 
00220         }
00221     }
00222     std::cout << "\nTotal Number of Fluid Particles :: " << o_fluidParticleList.size() << "\n" <<std::endl;
00223 }

00245 void SimulationParameters::initialiseCameraParameters(
00246                                                         ngl::Vector &o_eye,
00247                                                         ngl::Vector &o_look,
00248                                                         ngl::Vector &o_up
00249                                                       )
00250 {
00251     //load settings xml file
00252     pugi::xml_document doc;
00253     doc.load_file(s_settingsDocumentPath.c_str());
00254     //load global settings here
00255     pugi::xpath_node_set node = doc.select_nodes("/Settings/Camera");
00256     std::vector<ngl::Real> tmp;
00257 
00258     tmp = getFloatVectorFromString(node.first().node().attribute("eye").value(), 3);
00259 
00260     o_eye.set(tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2]);
00261 
00262     tmp = getFloatVectorFromString(node.first().node().attribute("look").value(), 3);
00263 
00264     o_look.set(tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2]);
00265 
00266     tmp = getFloatVectorFromString(node.first().node().attribute("up").value(), 3);
00267 
00268     o_up.set(tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2]);
00269 
00270     std::cout << "\n Camera Values ---------" << "\tEye :: " << o_eye << "\tLook :: " << o_look << "\tUp Vector :: " << o_up << std::endl;

00273 void SimulationParameters::initialiseExportParameters(bool &o_exportEnabled, std::string &o_exportPath, float &o_exportFrameInterval)
00274 {
00275     //load settings xml file
00276     pugi::xml_document doc;
00277     doc.load_file(s_settingsDocumentPath.c_str());
00278     //load global settings here
00279     pugi::xpath_node_set node = doc.select_nodes("/Settings/Export");
00280 
00281     o_exportEnabled = node.first().node().attribute("enable").as_bool();
00282 
00283     o_exportPath = node.first().node().attribute("path").value();
00284 
00285     int i  = node.first().node().attribute("exportFPS").as_int();
00286 
00287     float temp = (1.0 / i) * 100;
00288     temp = floor(temp);
00289     temp = temp / 100.0 ;
00290     o_exportFrameInterval = temp ;
00291 
00292     std::cout << "o_exportFrameINterval :: " << o_exportFrameInterval << std::endl;
00293 
00294 }
